ActIncome Tax Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (2006 DROUGHT REGIONS) by identifying those areas in the provinces of Alberta, British Columbia, Ontario and Saskatchewan that are eligible drought regions for income tax relief on proceeds from the sale of breeding livestock for the 2006 tax year.
